extensionDescription.message: An open source, free browser extension for Microsoft To Do that keeps you focused from work to play.

optionsEnableKeepLastTasklist.message: Remember the task list used last time

optionsEnableKeepLastTasklistHelp.message: After opening, the extension will select the task list used when the last task is added by default

optionsDefaultTasklistHelp.message: The extension will always select the default task list setting

optionsEnableForceFillHelp.message: After the compulsory fill is turned on, even if there is an unprepared task (the submitted button with the number *), the content of the current form will be covered

optionsEnableAutoFillHelp.message: After turning on the automatic fill, the extension will automatically fill the current selected content to the form

optionsAutoFillModeHelp.message: The fill mode can specify the extension to be filled in accordance with the way

optionsAutoFillTitle.message: Fill in the selected content to 'title'

optionsAutoFillDesc.message: Fill in the selected content to 'Description'

optionsEnableAutoResetHelp.message: After the task is successfully created, the content of the current form is automatically reset, which is suitable for scenarios where multiple tasks are created continuously
